bio:
Ra'jirr, a Khajiit man, is currently in Frostmere Crypt and is attempting to banish an ancient and powerful ghost called The Pale Lady.
Ra'jirr is a new recruit to Kyr's gang in Frostmere Crypt, along with Eisa Blackthorn. Ra'jirr and Eisa are both former members of the White River Gang. The two of them are the only survivors of a failed mutiny at White River Watch.
Like most Khajiit, he speaks in the third person, referring to himself as "this one". For example, if he wanted to express that he is tired, he would say "This one is tired".
name: Ra'jirr
